Package com.lmax.solana4j.api

Interface Accounts

public interface Accounts
Interface representing a collection of accounts in the Solana blockchain.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getCountSigned()
    Returns the count of signed accounts.
    int
    getCountSignedReadOnly()
    Returns the count of read-only signed accounts.
    int
    getCountUnsignedReadOnly()
    Returns the count of read-only unsigned accounts.
    List<PublicKey>
    getFlattenedAccountList()
    Returns a flattened list of all public keys in the account collection.
    List<AddressLookupTableEntrys>
    getLookupAccounts()
    Returns a list of address lookup table indexes.
    List<PublicKey>
    getStaticAccounts()
    Returns a list of static public keys that do not change.

  • Method Details

    • getFlattenedAccountList

      List<PublicKey> getFlattenedAccountList()
      Returns a flattened list of all public keys in the account collection.
      Returns:
      a list of PublicKey objects representing all accounts

    • getStaticAccounts

      List<PublicKey> getStaticAccounts()
      Returns a list of static public keys that do not change.
      Returns:
      a list of PublicKey objects representing static accounts

    • getLookupAccounts

      List<AddressLookupTableEntrys> getLookupAccounts()
      Returns a list of address lookup table indexes.
      Returns:
      a list of AddressLookupTableEntrys objects representing lookup accounts

    • getCountSigned

      int getCountSigned()
      Returns the count of signed accounts.
      Returns:
      the number of signed accounts

    • getCountSignedReadOnly

      int getCountSignedReadOnly()
      Returns the count of read-only signed accounts.
      Returns:
      the number of read-only signed accounts

    • getCountUnsignedReadOnly

      int getCountUnsignedReadOnly()
      Returns the count of read-only unsigned accounts.
      Returns:
      the number of read-only unsigned accounts
